name: 3D Game Field - Dark Magician Girl Nexus Theme
description: Dark Magician Girl theme (experimental 3D game field)
additional_info:
Bug fixes including the experimental 3D field (you can remove it with the "Edit" button in Stylus). 
After a long time away from Dueling Nexus I finally decided to come back to this project. It includes some bug fixes created from the latest updates of the site.
